name: Hanoi Budget Travelling
description: You will experience the Vietnamese delicious cuisine, witness well-preserved traditional Vietnamese architectures blended with the simple beauty in normal life of Vietnamese on foot or motorbike at the same time. If you have any special requests, I can customize. even for the time, you just need to tell me your plan. Whatever I know, I am willing to share with my tourists about culture, special historic stories, Vietnamese lifestyle and the belief in tradition based on my own family's generations.I am sure that you will have unforgettable memories.
